name: Zombie Maraud
description:
Your objective is to survive while shooting away the spawning zombies, while purchasing upgrades and surviving increasingly harder rounds.

This game was developed as part of a small 7 day game jam, where the twist was that everyone had to use the same 96x96 spritesheet, which was worked on by 6 different people.

I participated in this small jam with Fopull, RetroBarbare, SmashArtist, BDP and TortMcGee, who all worked on the spritesheet above.

Font used is Kenney Mini from Kenney Fonts.

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Shooting: Left Mouse Button
  • Interacting: Z / X / C / Spacebar / Enter
  • Pausing: Esc / P
